com.soctec.soctec.achievements

Class AchievementCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.soctec.soctec.achievements.AchievementCreator

  • public class AchievementCreator
extends java.util.Observable
    An AchievementCreator creates Achievement objects on request, either from a resource, or via public methods.
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Joakim Schmidt

      • createAchievement

        public Achievement createAchievement(java.lang.String[] def)
        Creates an Achievement, complete with Demands, based on definition in parameter
        Parameters:
        def - defines the Achievement
        Returns:
        the new Achievement

      • createFromFile

        public void createFromFile()
        Attempts to create multiple Achievements from resource. Created Achievements are sent to AchievementUnlocker via Observable.notifyAll()
        See Also:
        Observable

      • createTestAch

        public void createTestAch(java.lang.String line)
        Used to manually create Achievements for testing purposes
        Parameters:
        line - string with comma-separated definition of Achievement

      • recreateAchievement

        public void recreateAchievement(Achievement achievement)
        Used to create a new Achievement based on an old Achievement This can also be used to recreate a copy of the old Achievement
        Parameters:
        achievement - an old Achievement

      • incID

        private java.lang.String incID(java.lang.String ID)
        Creates a new ID based on the old one, by incrementing the number by one.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID to be incremented
        Returns:
        the new, incremented, ID
